file.name: job.yaml
file.content:
# Copyright 2022, Andrew Lindesay
# Distributed under the terms of the MIT License.

openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: HDS Job API
  version: "2.0"
tags:
  - name: job
paths:
  /__api/v2/job/search-jobs:
    post:
      tags:
        - job
      operationId: searchJobs
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/searchJobsRequestEnvelope"
      responses:
        200:
          description: >
            The results of searching for a job
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/searchJobsResponseEnvelope"
  /__api/v2/job/get-job:
    post:
      tags:
        - job
      operationId: getJob
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/getJobRequestEnvelope"
      responses:
        200:
          description: >
            The results of querying a job
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/getJobResponseEnvelope"

components:
  schemas:
    searchJobsRequestEnvelope:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/abstractSearchRequest"
        - type: object
          properties:
            ownerUserNickname:
              type: string
            statuses:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/jobStatus"
    searchJobsResponseEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/searchJobsResult"
        error:
          $ref: "./error.yaml#/components/schemas/error"
    searchJobsResult:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/searchJobsResultItem"
    searchJobsResultItem:
      type: object
      properties:
        guid:
          type: string
        jobStatus:
          $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/jobStatus"
        jobTypeCode:
          type: string
        ownerUserNickname:
          type: string
        startTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        finishTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        queuedTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        failTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        cancelTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        progressPercent:
          type: integer
    getJobRequestEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        guid:
          type: string
    getJobResponseEnvelope:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/getJobResult"
        error:
          $ref: "./error.yaml#/components/schemas/error"
    getJobResult:
      type: object
      properties:
        guid:
          type: string
        jobStatus:
          $ref: "./common.yaml#/components/schemas/jobStatus"
        jobTypeCode:
          type: string
        ownerUserNickname:
          type: string
        startTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        finishTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        queuedTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        failTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        cancelTimestamp:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        progressPercent:
          type: integer
        generatedDatas:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/jobData"
    jobData:
      type: object
      properties:
        useCode:
          type: string
        guid:
          type: string
        mediaTypeCode:
          type: string
        filename:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "searchJobsRequestEnvelope": parse schema: parse schema: at 1:1080: external "./common.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
